page.title: 04COMMUNICATIONS K.MALZEARD
page.content: {KIRKBY MALZEARD & GREWELTHORPE POSTAL {SERVICE:}Letter and parcel delivery service daily and 2 daily collections from letter boxes in each village (Not Sundays). The postman delivers by van and land rover to isolated dwellings in all but the most inclement weather(heavy snow) {TELEPHONES}most people have telephones which neighbours use in emergencies. There is a coin operated telephone box in each village. Both are necessary in a rural area. Vandalism rarely occurs. {NEWSPAPERS}on sale at local shops delivered in the villages by children who earn pocket money by doing this. {PARISH NEWSLETTER}produced locally for religious comment & local information. {MOBILE LIBRARY}with helpful librarian, visits each village weekly. {LOCAL NEWS}travles fast by word of mouth.
